property.value:
--[[
Change below value to change overall initial dampening. The bigger the value, the greater the initial high precision around the touch starting point.
]]-- local sensitivity = 1.5
-- no changes needed after this point :)
local lastValue = { x = nil, y = nil, } local zero_x local zero_y local horz_x = nil local scale = 0
function getOrientation() --[[ This ensures that for: - vertical faders, and - 90 degrees rotated XY controls (EAST, WEST) we use the screen Y axis! to measure start point distance ]]-- horz_x = true if ( self.properties.orientation == Orientation.NORTH or self.properties.orientation == Orientation.SOUTH ) then -- vertical fader! if self.type == ControlType.FADER then horz_x = false end else -- 90 degrees rotated XY control! if self.type == ControlType.XY then horz_x = false end end end
function onValueChanged(k) local pointer = self.pointers[1] if pointer == nil then return end if horz_x == nil then getOrientation() end -- let's go if k == 'touch' and self.values.touch then -- init touch start point on touch press zero_x = pointer.x zero_y = pointer.y scale = 0 elseif k == 'x' or k == 'y' then -- process current pointer position if lastValue[k] == nil then lastValue[k] = self.values[k] return end local rel, max if ( (k == 'x' and not horz_x) or (k == 'y' and horz_x) ) then max = self.frame.h * sensitivity rel = pointer.y - zero_y else max = self.frame.w * sensitivity rel = pointer.x - zero_x end scale = math.max(0, scale, math.min(1, math.abs(rel/max))) local delta = (self.values[k] - lastValue[k]) * scale lastValue[k] = lastValue[k] + delta -- print('Scale: ' .. string.format("%.6f", scale)) self.values[k] = lastValue[k] end end
-- ##################################################
local delay = 300 -- the maximum elapsed time between taps local last = 0
function onPointer() if (not self.values.touch) then local now = getMillis() if(now - last < delay) then self.values.x = self.properties.centered and 0.5 or 0 last = 0 else last = now end end end

local siblings = self.parent.children local target = siblings.midiValue
function onValueChanged(val) if self.values.x == 1 then step = 1 / (target.gridSteps - 1) newVal = math.max(0, target.values.x - step) target.values.x = newVal end end

local siblings = self.parent.children local target = siblings.midiValue
function onValueChanged(val) if self.values.x == 1 then step = 1 / (target.gridSteps - 1) newVal = math.min(1, target.values.x + step) target.values.x = newVal end end

local delay = 300 -- the maximum elapsed time between taps local last = 0

local buttons = self.parent:findAllByType(ControlType.BUTTON)
function onValueChanged(key) if self.values.x == 1 then for k in pairs(buttons) do button = buttons[k] tag = button.tag if tag ~= self.tag then button.values.x = 0 end end end end

value.default: Some arbitrary controls for demonstration purposes:

property.value: local a = nil function onReceiveNotify(k) if k == 'blink' then -- save original alpha if a == nil then a = self.parent.children.labelDisplay.color.a end self:setValueField('x', ValueField.DEFAULT, a) self:setValueField('x', ValueField.CURRENT,0) end end

-- luaCtrl STEP = 1 LIMIT = 2 REP = 3 local delay = 300 local last = 0 local d local config = { STEP = 0, LIMIT = 0, REP = 0, } local currValue = 0
function getValues() local i = 1 for v in string.gmatch(self.tag, "[^%s]+") do config[i] = tonumber(v) i=i+1 end for i=1,3 do if config[i] == nil then config[i]=0 end end currValue = tonumber(self.parent.children.labelDisplay.values.text) if currValue == nil then currValue = 0 end end
function setValue() getValues() -- negative ? n = math.floor(math.abs(config[STEP])) == math.floor(config[STEP]) if ( (n and currValue >= config[LIMIT]) or (not n and currValue <= config[LIMIT]) ) then self.parent.children.btnBlink:notify('blink') return end self.parent.children.labelDisplay:notify('valueChange', config[STEP]) end
function onValueChanged(k) if k == 'touch' and self.values.touch then getValues() setValue() d = delay end end
function onPointer() local now = getMillis() if self.values.touch then getValues() if ( now - self.pointers[1].created > d and now - last > d ) then d = config[REP] last = now + d setValue() end end end

function onReceiveNotify(k,v) local i = tonumber(self.values.text) if i == nil then self.values.text = 0 end j = tonumber(v) if j == nil then print('ERROR. Did not receive a number value! Value was: "' .. v .. '"') return end self.values.text = i + j end

-- luaCtrl STEP = 1 LIMIT = 2 REP = 3 local delay = 300 local last = 0 local d local config = { STEP = 0, LIMIT = 0, REP = 0, } local currValue = 0
function getValues() local i = 1 for v in string.gmatch(self.tag, "[^%s]+") do config[i] = tonumber(v) i=i+1 end for i=1,3 do if config[i] == nil then config[i]=0 end end currValue = tonumber(self.parent.children.labelDisplay.values.text) if currValue == nil then currValue = 0 end end
function setValue() getValues() -- negative ? n = math.floor(math.abs(config[STEP])) == math.floor(config[STEP]) if ( (n and currValue >= config[LIMIT]) or (not n and currValue <= config[LIMIT]) ) then self.parent.children.btnBlink:notify('blink') return end self.parent.children.labelDisplay:notify('valueChange', config[STEP]) end
function onValueChanged(k) if k == 'touch' and self.values.touch then getValues() setValue() d = delay end end
function onPointer() local now = getMillis() if self.values.touch then getValues() if ( now - self.pointers[1].created > d and now - last > d ) then d = config[REP] last = now + d setValue() end end end

value.default: Limit to controls in this group:

property.value:
-- luaCtrl stLblPresetRoot local kbd = self.parent.parent.children.groupKeyboard
function onValueChanged(k) if k == 'touch' and not self.values.touch then --on release kbd:notify(self.ID, self.values.text) end end
function onReceiveNotify(cmd, text) self.values.text = text end

local display = self.children.lcdKbdDisplay function onReceiveNotify(callerID, text) -- Save the passed caller ID string in procStack tag for response later. self.children.procStack.tag = callerID display.values.text = text .. '_' self.properties.visible = true self.properties.interactive = true end

---@diagnostic disable: lowercase-global, undefined-global -- luaCtrl procStack -- NOTE: We assume that a cursor char is ALWAYS present at the end. This gets added when our -- parent group initially receives the text and puts it into the display text value. local shift = false local chars = { a = {'a','A'}, b = {'b','B'}, c = {'c','C'}, d = {'d','D'}, e = {'e','E'}, f = {'f','F'}, g = {'g','G'}, h = {'h','H'}, i = {'i','I'}, j = {'j','J'}, k = {'k','K'}, l = {'l','L'}, m = {'m','M'}, n = {'n','N'}, o = {'o','O'}, p = {'p','P'}, q = {'q','Q'}, r = {'r','R'}, s = {'s','S'}, t = {'t','T'}, u = {'u','U'}, v = {'v','V'}, w = {'w','W'}, x = {'x','X'}, y = {'y','Y'}, z = {'z','Z'}, d1 = {'1', '!'}, d2 = {'2', '@'}, d3 = {'3', '#'}, d4 = {'4', '$'}, d5 = {'5', '%'}, d6 = {'6', '^'}, d7 = {'7', '&'}, d8 = {'8', '*'}, d9 = {'9', '('}, d0 = {'0', ')'}, quote = {"'", '"'}, btick = {"`", '~'}, semi = {';', ':'}, colon = {",", '<'}, dot = {'.', '>'}, slash = {'/', '?'}, backslash = {'\\', '|'}, equal = {'=', '+'}, minus = {'-', '_'}, bopen = {'[', '{'}, bclose = {']', '}'}, }
function onValueChanged(k) local keyStroke = self.values.text local textCtrl = self.parent.children.lcdKbdDisplay self.values.text = '' if keyStroke == 'shift' then shift = not shift for k,s in pairs(chars) do self.parent.children[k].values.text = shift and s[2] or s[1] end return elseif keyStroke == 'kbdClose' then -- Special key stroke that closes the keyboard. -- Notify the caller saved in our tag that we are done. local callerCtrl = root:findByID(self.tag, true) if callerCtrl == nil then print('!! ERROR closing keyboard! Could not find control for caller ID: ' .. self.tag) else callerCtrl:notify(keyStroke, textCtrl.values.text:sub(1,-2)) end self.parent.properties.visible = false self.parent.interactive = false return end -- remove cursor textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text:sub(1,-2) if keyStroke == '<<' then textCtrl.values.text = string.sub(textCtrl.values.text, 1, -2) else textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text .. keyStroke end -- re-add cursor textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text .. '_' end

-- luaCtrl grpKeyboard labels local presetModule = self.parent.parent.children local last = 0 local delay = tonumber(self.parent.children.delay.values.text) local rep = tonumber(self.parent.children.rep.values.text) local d
function onValueChanged(k) if self.values.touch then d = delay end end
function onPointer() local now = getMillis() if self.values.touch then if ( now - self.pointers[1].created > d and now - last > d ) then d = rep last = now + d self.parent.children.procStack.values.text = self.values.text end end end

--[[START direct_load_swipe_ctrl.lua]]local a=self.parent.parent.children.luaProcessor;local b=0.05;local c=7;local d=20;local e=30;local f=1;local g;local h=0;local i=false;local j=false;local k=false;local l=e;local m=0;local n=false;local o;local p;local q;local r;local s;function pagePlus()a:notify('pagePlusDirectLoad')end;function pageMinus()a:notify('pageMinusDirectLoad')end;function init()o=self.parent.children.swipeable;p=o.frame;q={}for t=1,#o.children do if o.children[t].type==ControlType.BUTTON then table.insert(q,o.children[t])end end;s=self.frame.w;r=s/2;g={x=r,y=self.frame.h/2}end;function update()local u=getMillis()if u-m<l or i or k then return end;m=u;if not k then l=e end;getHome()end;function onValueChanged(v)if v~='touch'or self.values.touch or j or n then return end;triggerButton('directSelect')end;function triggerButton(w)for t=1,#q do if q[t].frame:contains(g.x+s,g.y)then a:notify(w,q[t].tag)break end end end;function getHome()local x=math.fmod(math.abs(p.x),s)if x>r then x=x-s end;x=x/r;absAccel=math.abs(x)absSpeed=math.abs(h)if absSpeed>d*f then slowDown()elseif absAccel>b*f then f=2;h=h+x*c else p.x=-s;f=1;k=true;l=500;return end;pan(h)end;function slowDown()if h==0 then return end;h=h-b*h end;function pan(y)p.x=p.x+y;if p.x<-s*1.5 then p.x=p.x+s;pagePlus()elseif p.x>-s*0.5 then p.x=p.x-s;pageMinus()end end;function onPointer(z)local A=z[1].state;local B=math.floor(z[1].x-g.x)g={x=z[1].x,y=z[1].y}if A==PointerState.BEGIN then l=500;j=false;i=true;k=false;n=false;f=1;h=0 elseif A==PointerState.MOVE then h=B;if math.abs(h)>1 then j=true end;pan(h)elseif A==PointerState.END then i=false;if not k then l=e end end;if self.values.touch and not j then if getMillis()-self.pointers[1].created>1000 and not n then n=true;triggerButton('longTap')end end end--[[END direct_load_swipe_ctrl.lua]]

Label holding all processing LUA logic.
function onValueChanged(k) if k == 'x' then self.parent.children.luaProcessor:notify(self.name, self.values.x) end end
function onValueChanged(k) if k == 'x' then self.parent.children.luaProcessor:notify(self.name, self.values.x) end end

local display = self.children.lcdKbdDisplay function onReceiveNotify(callerID, text) -- Save the passed caller ID string in procStack tag for response later. self.children.procStack.tag = callerID display.values.text = text .. '_' self.properties.visible = true self.properties.interactive = true end

---@diagnostic disable: lowercase-global, undefined-global -- luaCtrl procStack -- NOTE: We assume that a cursor char is ALWAYS present at the end. This gets added when our -- parent group initially receives the text and puts it into the display text value. local shift = false local chars = { a = {'a','A'}, b = {'b','B'}, c = {'c','C'}, d = {'d','D'}, e = {'e','E'}, f = {'f','F'}, g = {'g','G'}, h = {'h','H'}, i = {'i','I'}, j = {'j','J'}, k = {'k','K'}, l = {'l','L'}, m = {'m','M'}, n = {'n','N'}, o = {'o','O'}, p = {'p','P'}, q = {'q','Q'}, r = {'r','R'}, s = {'s','S'}, t = {'t','T'}, u = {'u','U'}, v = {'v','V'}, w = {'w','W'}, x = {'x','X'}, y = {'y','Y'}, z = {'z','Z'}, d1 = {'1', '!'}, d2 = {'2', '@'}, d3 = {'3', '#'}, d4 = {'4', '$'}, d5 = {'5', '%'}, d6 = {'6', '^'}, d7 = {'7', '&'}, d8 = {'8', '*'}, d9 = {'9', '('}, d0 = {'0', ')'}, quote = {"'", '"'}, btick = {"`", '~'}, semi = {';', ':'}, colon = {",", '<'}, dot = {'.', '>'}, slash = {'/', '?'}, backslash = {'\\', '|'}, equal = {'=', '+'}, minus = {'-', '_'}, bopen = {'[', '{'}, bclose = {']', '}'}, }
function onValueChanged(k) local keyStroke = self.values.text local textCtrl = self.parent.children.lcdKbdDisplay self.values.text = '' if keyStroke == 'shift' then shift = not shift for k,s in pairs(chars) do self.parent.children[k].values.text = shift and s[2] or s[1] end return elseif keyStroke == 'kbdClose' then -- Special key stroke that closes the keyboard. -- Notify the caller saved in our tag that we are done. local callerCtrl = root:findByID(self.tag, true) if callerCtrl == nil then print('!! ERROR closing keyboard! Could not find control for caller ID: ' .. self.tag) else callerCtrl:notify(keyStroke, textCtrl.values.text:sub(1,-2)) end self.parent.properties.visible = false self.parent.interactive = false return end -- remove cursor textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text:sub(1,-2) if keyStroke == '<<' then textCtrl.values.text = string.sub(textCtrl.values.text, 1, -2) else textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text .. keyStroke end -- re-add cursor textCtrl.values.text = textCtrl.values.text .. '_' end
